root.name: Mickey's Ultimate Challenge
root.description: Mickey's Ultimate Challenge is a video game starring Mickey Mouse that was made for very young children. The story involves Mickey Mouse arriving in a kingdom that's plauged by earthquakes due to the snoring of a giant, it is up to Mickey to wake him up. To do this he must win items from the towns residents by playing various minigames. The game is nonviolent and most of the minigames are designed to help kids increase their mental abilities.

similar_games.game: Land of Illusion starring Mickey Mouse
